front.title: IEEE Standard for Qualification of Safety-Related Actuators for Nuclear Power Generating Stations

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Direction for the implementation of the requirements of IEEE Std 323trade-2003 as they apply to the specific features of safety-related actuator qualification are provided. This standard establishes criteria for qualification of safety-related actuators, and actuator components, in Nuclear Power Generating Stations in order to demonstrate their ability to perform their intended safety functions under all required conditions.
